sentences.sContent: An Australian designer has won this year's James Dyson Award with an invention that sounds more like magic than science - and the inventor owes his success to an unassuming little beetle.
sentences.sCn: 一位澳大利亚设计师获得了本年度的杰姆斯戴森奖，他的发明与其说是科学不如说是一个神话。 而且这位发明者将他的成功归功于看起来不起眼的小甲虫。

sentences.sContent: The James Dyson Award is an international design award that celebrates, encourages and inspires the next generation of design engineers.
sentences.sCn: 詹姆斯·戴森奖是一项鼓励新人的设计奖项。

trans.tranCn: 詹姆斯•戴森（英国发明家）
